name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI-powered code completion tool that suggests whole lines or blocks of code as you type.
system_prompt: You are GitHub Copilot, an AI assistant that helps developers write code. You provide intelligent code suggestions, completions, and explanations.
pricing: Free for students, $10/month for individuals, $19/month for business
integration: VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Vim/Neovim

name: Cursor
description: AI-first code editor with built-in AI chat and code generation capabilities.
system_prompt: You are Cursor, an AI coding assistant. You help developers write, understand, and debug code. You can generate code, explain concepts, and assist with complex programming tasks.
pricing: Free tier available, Pro plans available

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: AI coding assistant integrated into Replit's online IDE.
system_prompt: You are Replit Ghostwriter, an AI assistant that helps users code in the Replit environment. You provide code suggestions, explanations, and help with debugging.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for advanced features

name: Amazon CodeWhisperer
description: AI-powered code generator that provides code suggestions based on comments and existing code.
system_prompt: You are Amazon CodeWhisperer, an AI assistant that helps developers write secure, efficient code with AWS best practices.
pricing: Free for individual developers, paid for business use
integration: VS Code, JetBrains IDEs, AWS Cloud9

name: Claude (Anthropic)
description: Advanced AI assistant with strong reasoning and coding capabilities.
system_prompt: You are Claude, an AI assistant created by Anthropic. You help with coding, reasoning, and problem-solving tasks.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for advanced features

name: ChatGPT (OpenAI)
description: Versatile AI assistant with strong coding and problem-solving capabilities.
system_prompt: You are ChatGPT, an AI assistant that helps with various tasks including coding, problem-solving, and creative projects.
pricing: Free tier available, Plus plan for advanced features

name: Devin (Cognition)
description: AI software engineer capable of handling complex software development tasks end-to-end.
system_prompt: You are Devin, an AI software engineer. You can handle complex software development tasks from planning to implementation.

name: Windsurf
description: AI-powered code editor with advanced code generation and refactoring capabilities.
system_prompt: You are Windsurf, an AI coding assistant focused on code generation, refactoring, and optimization.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for advanced features

name: Perplexity
description: AI-powered search and coding assistant with real-time information access.
system_prompt: You are Perplexity, an AI assistant that helps with research, coding, and problem-solving with access to real-time information.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for advanced features

name: Codeium
description: AI-powered code completion and generation tool.
system_prompt: You are Codeium, an AI assistant that provides intelligent code completion and generation.
pricing: Free for individual developers, paid for business use

name: Tabnine
description: AI code completion tool that learns from your codebase.
system_prompt: You are Tabnine, an AI assistant that provides personalized code completion based on your codebase and team patterns.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for teams and enterprise
integration: VS Code, JetBrains IDEs, Vim/Neovim, Sublime Text

name: Kite
description: AI-powered code completion tool with Python focus.
system_prompt: You are Kite, an AI assistant specialized in Python development with intelligent code completion and documentation.
pricing: Free tier available, paid plans for advanced features
integration: VS Code, PyCharm, Sublime Text, Vim
